All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminController
a controller for all the actions that can be made by the book store admin
ApplicationConfig
The spring security configuration
BeanConfiguration
the class for Bean Configuration
Book
a class to represent a book at the book store
BookRepository
This is the repository that handles the access to the database 'Book'.
BookService
This service handles the repositories for the books and payments
Cart
This class represents the book store cart of a user, who's represented by a session
CustomErrorController
a controller to implements the ErrorController to represent an 'error' page
Ex4Application
The main application
Ex4ApplicationTests
Class for optional tests for the application
Payment
Database for Payments
PaymentRepository
This is the repository that handles the access to the database 'Payment'.
SessionListenerCounter
a @WebListener class for session count the @Component is needed only if we INJECT beans
SpringSecurityApplication
main class
StoreController
a controller for all the actions that can be made by the book store user
